evidence.claim: PHAR utilizes AWS services for its cloud infrastructure which supports various health analytic solutions.
The company emphasizes HIPAA compliance in its data management practices for health analytics.
PHAR implements integration patterns using data streaming technologies like Kafka for real-time data processing.
Their solutions support healthcare data standards including HL7 and FHIR for interoperability.
Company mentions data security and compliance adhering to EDI X12 standards for healthcare transactions.

icp.icp_reason: Matches healthcare data exchange criteria and uses HIPAA X12 transactions.
